name: Honor Keeper: Between Blood & Sacrifice
description:
You control Selina Domnik, one of the most powerful Honor Keepers in the realm! An old threat returns to destroy everything created by the Order to defend the Realm. It's your duty to recover the conquered lands and restore the kingdom's peace.

The game provides a short experience (about 20 minutes) inspired by Sifu and the Soul's franchise.

Developers:

  • Ikaro Siqueira Rodrigues Vitor - Game Director
  • Lucas Lima Lordello - Lead Programmer

We developed this game for our Computer Science Graduation Program at the Federal University of Itajubá (UNIFEI). We really hope you enjoy the experience! 

We created many features to help the player customize the game to achieve better performance! Especially related to the Realtime (ON/OFF) lighting!

Feel free to contact us for bugs report and anything you might want to know! (Our social media can be found in the game's credits)
